product_name: prAna Freemont Pants - Men's 32" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether your day includes a trip to the climbing gym or a casual stroll around town, the prAna Freemont pants with a 32 in. inseam offer comfort, mobility and good looks. Textured Bedford cord cotton fabric is highly breathable and very soft for excellent comfort. Zip fly with button closure; gusseted inseam; reinforced hand pocket entries. Closeout.
